website_summaries.verdict: A volcano, river, cave, and dinosaurs – this machine-washable dinosaur-themed rug offers a lot, although some buyers felt that it could have been a little more plush.
pros: A prehistoric-themed rug that also comes with four dinosaur play figures
Reinforced border keeps fraying to a minimum
Good details on rug for lots of playing potential
cons: The dinosaur play figures are pretty flimsy and small
Some felt that this rug was on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rug for dinosaur creative play
customer_reviews.text: Great little rug and dinosaur set, dinosaurs were large enough to not pose a choking hazard to a child 18 months and older to be able to enjoy playing as well. Only thing is the tufting on the outside of one dinosaur started peeling off within a week. I called Melissa and Doug customer service and it was taken care of immediately and the dinosaurs were replaced. Haven’t had any issues once the new set arrived! Very cute and fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki’s Childcare

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as expected
customer_reviews.text: While the grandsons love the rug so much they want to nap on it, it is smaller than I pictured. The dimensions are accurate, so it is only my perspective. Even the box it came in though seemed like it would roll out to be larger and more of a playful, inviting environment for creative play. We have plastic fold up play mats that feel more inventive and exploratory. Try again, Melissa and Doug! You excel most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Novice

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Rug
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our almost 7 year old dinosaur enthusiast. He immediately called it his 'Jurassic Park' carpet and went to work putting his dino figures all over it. Unanticipated bonus, because there is a river, pond, and waterfall, he also used the mat for his Octonaut and ocean figures. Came packed like most rugs, long narrow box, basically zero set up time.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set , could be made better
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set with very nice mat. Our grandson was very excited when he opened it. The rug doesn’t pick at all which I have seen in other brands. Price was fine. The dinosaurs themselves however are cheap. Very lightweight so then fall over easily on the mat. Otherwise this would have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: cindi lu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Play Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Our LO has had this mat for months now, and it has held up to countless hours of play! Well made and soft - perfect for imaginative play. It is not too big, not too small, but just the right size for LO to sit beside while she plays with her dinosaurs/figurines on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: VintageFOTO

customer_reviews.title: both love it. The mat is thin
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old and 3 years old boys, both love it. The mat is thin, but easy to fold. The toys are small and they are not very durable. I am overall happy with the purchase, but wish the toys could last longer.
customer_reviews.author: K GH

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute idea, but the dinosaurs are hollow and seem cheap. The rug is also somewhat flimsier than I expected it to be. It probably works much better on hard wood floors but it doesn’t stay in place at all in carpet. Too light weight. My son seems to like it though so that’s why I’m giving it 4 stars. Would have liked a sturdier rug/mat and some stronger built dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My mother and I bought a bunch of play rugs for the kids and it was awesome to have a dinosaur land amongst all the roads and what not. The kids absolutely loved playing on it! It’s a good, high quality play rug and I love how unique it is.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Valencic

customer_reviews.title: Substandard quality
customer_reviews.text: Not typical Melissa & Doug quality. After 5 minutes of play by our 4 year old grandson, the felt-type covering on the dinosaur started coming off (see photo). The mat seems to be good quality, but the dinosaurs are poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug always delivers! This rug is a great size for my twin toddlers to play on together. I like that it's made for dinosaurs, but is generic enough that they can play with other animals on it as well. Great for little imaginations!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! It comes with cute little dino toys. However the toys are kind of cheaply made. And the mat is smaller than I expected. So I don't think i would be repurchase for the price....
customer_reviews.author: Ang Fong

customer_reviews.title: Grandson and his dinosaur friends love this. It is far nicer than we had ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and his dinosaur friends love this. It is far nicer than we had expected. They can do away with the small dinosaurs that came with it, not impressive. The rug itself is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Portia51

customer_reviews.title: My five year old grandson liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Another gift for my grandson the dinosaur lover! He liked that it came with its own dinosaurs but added many of his own. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: litebeam58

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My class LOVED playing with this during dinosaur week at school and then my kiddos at home love playing with it too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Merin Wagner

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: RRRAAARRRRR!! My three year old grandson LOVES this addition to his dinosaur world.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMama

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it! He couldn't wait to take it out of the box and play with it. He is just under 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Night this may for my grandsons and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and colorful! Goes with lots of dinosaur things.
customer_reviews.author: patricia a lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! My dino obsessed little one is pumped!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Deann

customer_reviews.title: The rug is nice. Dinos not so much
customer_reviews.text: The little dinos it comes with fall apart easy but the rug is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: alexmcbride

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and a half year old Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: B.Derby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, the little dinosaurs that came with it were a perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made and so, so cute. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift from aunt, who had given him numerous Dinos of all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KaDe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! My daughter never rolls it up and has been out for last 4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson loved it. His 5 year old sister does too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rug is very good dino toys are extra
customer_reviews.text: The toys are covered with a thin layer of fabric used to add coloring to the dinosaurs. After a few hours of playtime the covering was frayed. The child eventually began peeling it off to expose the white plastic. These would have been better if the plastic was dyed instead of applying a thin fabric. It doesn't stop the playtime but cleanup of little pieces of fabric is constant until it is all removed. Would have returned, but the rug is good quality and lends to very imaginative playtime exploration of vegetation, mountains, waterfalls, ponds, volcanos and trails.
customer_reviews.author: Carbon

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and play cars and dinosaurs on it all the time. I was expecting it to be smaller but am definitely happy with it. It came with Dino's too.
customer_reviews.author: Catelin Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this rug is really small. I should have read the print in the description. My six year old likes it, and especially loved that it came with dinosaurs. I just wish it wasn’t so tiny. It was $24 so I could’ve found something bigger for the price. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Roach

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaurs that were included were very cheaply made. The "skins" were coming apart immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Stephens

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5yo) absolutely loves this rug! She's played with it everyday since it arrived. Quality seems great as Melissa and Doug products usually are. This one comes with 4 dinosaurs that are not that great of quality. The fuzz they have scratches off easily. I wish it was a little bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Poff

customer_reviews.title: The Prehistory Playground is great for imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: The Prehistory Playground is great for imaginative play. The mat zips up into a storage container to store dinos and unzips to create a small dino wonderland landscape of steams and mountains. We had an older version of this mat and it lasted for years until my son no longer played with and we donated. This is great to pack up for on the go because it is all self contained. Such a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful details
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old son and two year old nephew have a blast playing dinosaurs. They love the details of the volcano with lava, the river, and the beautiful dinosaurs included. They know all the dinosaurs by name. This is a well-made woven rug. I have bought similar items by different brands and it was a plastic rug. I expect this to last for years to come through many, many playdates. This is the perfect gift for any dinosaur loving child.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Ester

customer_reviews.title: Great for make believe play!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Hes obsessed with dinosaurs. He plays with them on this rug all the time and just makes his own fun!! Worth the money. Good quality and bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Good quality and size. Grand kids, especially my grandsons, love it. Perfect for play time and they look forward to it when they come over, which is wonderful. Very reasonable price as well. Nice product that I think will please most, if not all, who purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug Deliver as always!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug Deliver as always. While this is called a mat it is really like a very good quality rug with print on it which means it can easily be rolled up and put away without fear it will not remain flat when unrolled. The included dinosaurs was a great touch and ensured hours of play. As an aside my son also used the road on this for his race cars. really flexible and great quality
customer_reviews.author: M. Lo

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Like most Melissa and Doug branded toys, this is a very well made play mat. It comes with four dinosaurs but I'm guessing, if you're like us, you've got plenty of dinosaurs around already. The mat is not too big but it provides a fun play surface and also serves well as a rug. The bottom is coated so it doesn't slip around so much.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute i bought this for my son just the right size comes with 4 fuzzy dinosaurs
customer_reviews.author: Alex_12

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: My dinosaur obsessed nephew loved this mat and he was color coordinating his dinosaurs to different locations on the map almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: David Dale

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dinosaur rug! Fun to use toy dinosaurs to play make believe. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dinosaur loving boys. The rug and the figures were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: ROXY

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Prehistoric Playground Dinosaur Activity Rug
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingBring to life the prehistoric giants who walked the earth millions of years ago with this sturdy, colorful dinosaur play rug! Durably made to look great for countless playtimes to come, the woven rug with a skid-proof backing comes with four flocked dinosaur figures (T-Rex, Triceratops, Stegosaurus, Apatosaurus) and features details like a bubbling volcano, waterfall, river, a cool cave, jungle, and grassland to give many options for creative play. Large format is big enough for multiple kids and lots of dinosaurs. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.
feature_bullets: Colorful activity rug with prehistoric dinosaur theme (39 x 36 inches)
Includes 4 dinosaur play figures (T-Rex, Triceratops, Stegosaurus, Apatosaurus)
Durable rug material is machine-washable; skid-proof backing is safe on all floor surfaces

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars122 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
